root.message: The QUALITY_ASSMNT field for indicator 16-1-4, translated into en
root.data: UNODC will make available a quality assessment protocol for national statistics office to be used at national level and intended to assess the alignment of data produced with user’s needs, the compliance with guidelines in terms of computations, the timeliness of data production, the accessibility of statistics produced, the consistent use of methodology both in terms of geographic representation and through time, the coherence in terms of data production, and the architecture of data production.
